# Verify your installation

## Check your PyMAPDL version
```{python}
from ansys.mapdl.core import __version__
print(f"PyMAPDL version: {__version__}")
```

## Launch PyMAPDL
```{python}
from ansys.mapdl.core import mapdl_launch
mapdl = mapdl_launch()
```
